---

## About Vectornator

Vectornator represents the professional vector design solution for creating scalable graphics, illustrations, and typography across both macOS and Windows platforms. This powerful vector graphics application provides an intuitive interface combined with advanced design tools that enable creators to produce high-quality artwork for print, web, and mobile applications. The comprehensive toolset combined with modern user interface makes Vectornator the preferred choice for graphic designers, illustrators, UX/UI designers, and artists seeking to create resolution-independent vector artwork with precision and efficiency.

The application's sophisticated vector engine includes advanced path editing with bezier curve controls, real-time gradient editing with color picker integration, and comprehensive layer management for organizing complex design elements. Whether you're creating logos and brand assets, designing user interface mockups, developing illustrations for publications, producing marketing materials, or working on typographic designs, Vectornator delivers professional results with the scalability needed for both digital and print media. The cross-platform compatibility ensures consistent design experiences whether working on macOS systems or Windows computers, while the optimized performance provides smooth interaction even with complex vector compositions.

## âœ¨ Vectornator Advantages

ğŸ“ **Precision Drawing** - Advanced bezier curve tools with snap-to-grid and alignment guides

ğŸ­ **Gradient & Color** - Professional color management with gradients, palettes, and color harmony

ğŸ“± **Touch Gesture Support** - Intuitive touch controls for direct manipulation on compatible devices

ğŸŒ **File Format Support** - Import and export for AI, PDF, SVG, PSD, and standard image formats

ğŸ”„ **Auto Trace** - Convert raster images to editable vector artwork automatically

---

## âš™ï¸ System Requirements

**For macOS Systems:**
- macOS Monterey 12.0 or later
- 4GB RAM minimum (8GB recommended for complex illustrations)
- 300MB available storage space for application and project files
- Compatible with Intel and Apple Silicon processors
- High-resolution display recommended for detailed design work

**For Windows Platforms:**
- Windows 10 or later (64-bit architecture recommended)
- 4GB RAM (8GB recommended for optimal performance)
- 300MB available storage space
- DirectX 11 compatible graphics card
- Touchscreen support for gesture-based drawing (optional)

**Typography** - Custom lettering, text effects, and typographic compositions

**Print Design** - Business cards, brochures, posters, and marketing materials
